cbinstall.description: Provides groups with a About tab to display detailed group information.

param.name: groups_about_substitutions
param.label: Substitutions
param.description: Enable or disable usage of substitutions on group about.

param.name: groups_about_substitutions_user
param.label: Substitutions User
param.description: Select the user used for substitutions. This will determine whos profile data is used for default substitution usage without user parameter specified in the substitution.

param.name: groups_about_content_plugins
param.label: Content Plugins
param.description: Enable or disable usage of content plugins content.prepare on group about.

param.name: groups_about_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on group about. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.
